Summary: Watching ABC News at 11:00 a huge UFO object was flying over the crowd for 10 seconds; news narrators are speechless, and it made camera man to take another look!.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Washington
There were 3 other sightings in Washington on or around January 20th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching the Inaguration of Barack Obama on ABC News at 11:00 before Barack Came outside, the camera man caught a glimpse of a large ovular object, that appeard cloudy. And it was moving rather rapidly for a blimp object. The narrators just remained silent, but making a few grunts so as to assume they don't know what the camera man is zeroing into. it was a 10 second descension and hoverance over the cloud!
